events.name: Lithium-Ion Recycling
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: technological and industry trends
events.wd_description: Trends in patenting activities reveal a high interest in R&D on individual battery materials and components, indicating a shift towards comprehensive R&D approaches across the battery value chain.
events.description: Trends in patenting activities reveal a high interest in R&D on individual battery materials and components, indicating a shift towards comprehensive R&D approaches across the battery value chain.

events.name: patenting of individual components
events.wd_description: High levels of patenting activities are focused on individual battery materials and components.
events.description: High levels of patenting activities are focused on individual battery materials and components.

events.name: patenting across value chain steps
events.wd_description: There is an increasing trend towards patenting technologies that cover multiple steps of the battery value chain.
events.description: There is an increasing trend towards patenting technologies that cover multiple steps of the battery value chain.

events.name: Patent Analysis Trends
events.description: Analysis indicating high patenting activities in the early stages of the battery value chain, with a trend towards comprehensive R&D approaches covering multiple steps.

events.name: Challenges in Patent Analysis
events.description: Challenges in covering every value chain step with relevant IPC codes and the limitations of using patent data as a tool for technological analysis.

relations.wd_description: qualifies something (inception or end of a thing, event, or date) as happening previously to another thing
